short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Best Autofill Since Sliced Bread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autofill that actually works.
- Free.  - No login. - Open Source.
- Works really well.
- Your data isn't collected. Period.

Supported Sites: Workday Greenhouse

What's New?
Version 2.1.1 - 12/3/24
- greenhouse.io: Added Month-Year field, Searchable Dropdown field and Employment repeating section.
- greenhouse.io: Fixed autofill for Dropdown with Multi Select. However it can still only save and fill one value.

Version 2.1.0 - 11/19/24
- job-boards.greenhouse.io Added!
 All fields. Repeating sections work. (Dropdowns that allow more than one selection can only be auto filled with one selection for now.

Bugs
- job-boards.greenhouse (the newer one): page scroll behaves more erratic than usual when autofilling.
- boards.greenhous (the older one): Searchable Dropdown fields don't always autofill.

Version 2.0.0 - 11/6/24
- greenhouse.io added!
  - Added support for greenhouse.io*
  - Most common fields, including dropdowns, that address field and file upload.
  - The remaining fields will be added after job-boards.greenhouse.io.
*boards.greenhouse.io, not job-boards.greenhouse.io, which will be added in the next update.

Version 1.0.10 - 10/6/24
- Vastly improved workflow; just fill and save.

Version 1.0.9 - 9/26/24
- Widgets don't show up on search page
- Clicking outside closes the popup.

Version 1.0.8 - 9/12/24
Workday Fields:
- Multi checkbox field.
- m/d/y Date Field. Can be set as relative or absolute.
- Multi file upload.
Autofill
- Make pages match if both share a prefix.
Bugs
- fix bug where number inputs appear filled but don't work at final submit.

1.0.7 - 9/4/24
Autofill: Vastly improved answer management UI. Edit stored questions and answers. 
Advanced answer matching makes filling the 'Applications Section' a breeze!
Bug fixes.

1.0.6 - 8/9/24: Workday Fields: Year input and field of study (in education), yes/no radio.
Autofill: Ability to add backup answers to single dropdowns (searchable as well).
Popup: Contact button. 'What's New' dialog.

1.0.5 - 8/4/24: Fields: single checkbox, month & year. Try it out on Work Experience!
Added badges for saved and filled.

1.0.4 - 7/31/24: add searchable dropdown field. Fix ui syncing issue.

Overview
Every time you load a job application page, Job App Filler will successfully autofill any fields you have answers saved for.
Don't have an answer saved for a field? No problem! Job App Filler makes saving the current value of a field easy.
